mapper.insert: insert into login_ticket (user_id, ticket, expired, status) values (#{user_id}, #{ticket}, #{expired}, #{status})
mapper.select: select u.id, u.name, u.password, u.salt, u.gender, u.email, u.role from user u, login_ticket lt where u.id = lt.user_id and lt.ticket = #{ticket} and lt.status = 0 and lt.expired < now()
